evidence.content: Requirements complexity assessed: High complexity (8/10) driven by multi-role user system, dynamic form management, security requirements, and performance considerations. Functional requirements include complex role-based workflows, non-functional include security, performance, and usability across multiple user types.

Architecture characteristics evaluated: Medium-high complexity (7/10) from Firebase integration, multi-role system design, client-server data flows, and security architecture. System uses client-server model with Firebase backend, complex data flows between UI components and database, role-based security model.

Technology stack analyzed: Medium complexity (6/10) with vanilla JavaScript, Firebase ecosystem, and modern web standards. Complexity comes from Firebase integration, browser compatibility requirements, and security implementation, offset by lack of framework dependencies and simple build process.

Development factors reviewed: Medium complexity (5/10) with good code organization and excellent documentation, but limited by lack of version control, testing framework, and automated processes. Strong service architecture and comprehensive docs offset development workflow limitations.
